title: Social Engagement Competency Strengthening Through Experiential Philanthropy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic civic awareness and social responsibility principles
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers to experience the actual processes of charitable activities through experiential learning and acquire practice-based instructional methods applicable in future educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can research nonprofit organizations addressing community issues and propose at least three specific criteria for effective donation decisions
Learners can create experiential learning designs applicable to educational settings by reflecting on lessons learned through hands-on philanthropic activities
Learners can analyze changes in donation-related decision-making processes through pre- and post-surveys and evaluate learning outcomes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
